website_summaries.verdict: These uber-popular, tiny Hatchimals are increasingly in demand, and the 2-pack is a good size for an affordable gift.
pros: Tiny and adorable – an instant magnet for younger kids aged 4 to 8
The 2-pack is about the right size and price for an affordable gift
cons: Branding confuses some buyers, who may be expecting a full-sized Hatchimal
A few reports of the color-changing heart not working
Too small to be safe for toddlers

customer_reviews.title: a good reminder to check other places first and quite just ...
customer_reviews.text: paid way too much, but it wasn't until after I purchased these I learned their retail prices were so much less. oh well, a good reminder to check other places first and quite just blindly clicking here on amazon! lol
customer_reviews.author: Omani

customer_reviews.title: Great gift item!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product as a small gift item and it was such a huge hit! The little girls at the birthday party all gathered around to see what was inside the mystery eggs. Great gift idea!! Nicely priced and created many "oh's and ah's". Fun!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Really cute
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how kids feel about it, but my mom adores these little things. The element of surprise is fun and the animals are so cute. Honestly it seems so wasteful to get the big stuffed ones when these are way more fun.
customer_reviews.author: RavenWriter

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: These hit the market but not in stores at the time of purchase. We purchased these to see what the fuss was all about. They were more expensive than in stores however but a cute buy!
customer_reviews.author: krystal

customer_reviews.title: These little guys are just too adorable. Look out for the teal speckles eggs
customer_reviews.text: These little guys are just too adorable. Look out for the teal speckles eggs...they are the limited edition ;)
customer_reviews.author: Tricia K.

customer_reviews.title: Cute....
customer_reviews.text: They are cute. Love the material that they make the eggs out of. The kids have to break through the egg to see the Hatchimal.
customer_reviews.author: Trudie@UNIS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my niece! The look on her face when she opened the present was priceless!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mj Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase for a Young Child
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 4 year old niece for her birthday. Hatching them was perfect for her age and attention span. She plays with them daily and loves the size.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Rybinski

customer_reviews.title: Not the best, but worth the smile
customer_reviews.text: It was worth the smile on my daughters face. However, really hard for her to get to crack. I had to help.
customer_reviews.author: jessica albrecht

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: It’s a gift for my niece as she loves cracking these eggs to get little toys she equally loves playing with small toys.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these. They're very cute and fun to collect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Blind Box Item I've Purchased
customer_reviews.text: my granddaughter loved her tiny hatchimals!! easy to open, fun and adorable prizes inside. will buy more for her birthday coming up in july!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect surprise for my little one
customer_reviews.text: My son likes these silly things and I love my son so it's all good. Prompt shipping
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Cool gift for an 8 year old girl
customer_reviews.text: I got this today have not had a chance to gift to gift it yet but im sure they will like this.

customer_reviews.title: Daughters love these
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why my girls love these, but they're cute enough and got here in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear

customer_reviews.title: The heart changing color didn't happen for a few of them but the figures are adorable
customer_reviews.text: They are cute. The heart changing color didn't happen for a few of them but the figures are adorable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved hatching them
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved hatching them. They take a bit of rubbing to get them to hatch so you may have to help a younger child.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Two small hatchimals with no best for double the cost of a 4 pack with nest at Walmart

customer_reviews.title: She loved them.

customer_reviews.title: there really wasn't good instructions and they had to be opened by picking ...
customer_reviews.text: there really wasn't good instructions and they had to be opened by picking the egg apart. they did not open as expected.

customer_reviews.title: Am not satisfied with this purchase at all 😟
customer_reviews.text: The package sent to me was not the actual real hatchimal, it was replacia of it, Am not satisfied with this purchase at all 😟

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Top of the list for Christmas!!! Buy them early!! Adorable!

customer_reviews.title: Not worth money
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed and won't order again. Just a tiny animal statue in an egg.

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for a not very exiting toy. And ...
customer_reviews.text: Too expensive for a not very exiting toy. And the packaging made it so difficult to remove the egg without breaking it. Not impressed
customer_reviews.author: crushed419

customer_reviews.title: adorable collectible Hatchimals that come inside small
customer_reviews.text: Hatchimals CollEGGtibles ? adorable collectible Hatchimals that come inside small, speckled eggs. Each Hatchimals CollEGGtible needs your help to hatch! Hold the egg in your hands, rub the heart and when it changes from purple to pink, it?s ready to hatch! Press on the egg to crack it and discover which Hatchimal CollEGGtible is inside. Based on the colored speckled egg you can tell which family your Hatchimal belongs to before they hatch. There are over 70 to collect in Season One, even ultra-rare and special edition Hatchimals to find! Use the collector?s checklist and map to keep track of your collection and discover more about Hatchtopia. Hatchimals CollEGGtibles ? Hatch a Whole World!
customer_reviews.author: Barrieclark
